entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Value of DOTNET_WATCH inconsistent at build time #34055
  • Consider adding `.idea` to gitignore #34050
  • There is no warning / error when PublishAot is true, but compiler is not restored #34049

Closed

  • Downlevel wasm tests fail on net6.0.x runtime pack download #32864
    8.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34059
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support PublishAot in addition to RunAOTCompilation for doing Mono-based AOT #34051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.5.1 in /eng/dependabot #34047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.5.1 in /eng/dependabot #34046
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2223222 #34037
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34048
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Override versions of previous runtime packs #32882
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #34025
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #34034
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Keep TrimMode=partial for projects targeting .NET 7 or below #34030
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Tool install global command: Download tool packages from nuget when installing global tools #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Containers: improved `DockerRegistryManager` for tests reliability #33955
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • MSBuild: SourceBuild TF is NetCurrent #33188
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add .idea to .gitignore #34044
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Container Build: multiple registry push, single archive for multiple tags, tar.gz file writing. #32132
    Area-Containers
